Class: UIComponent

Defined in: app/tamarind/UIComponent.coffee
Inherits: EventEmitter

Overview

Superclass for visual components

Direct Known Subclasses

CodeEditor ControlDrawer Tamarind InputControlBase

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) overwrite(target) Replace an existing DOM node with this component
  • # (void) appendTo(target) Insert this component into an DOM node
  • # (void) setVisible(visible)
  • # (void) setInnerText(el, text) Remove an element's existing content and replace it with text @param el a css selector or DOM element
  • # (void) css(selector) Return the single element matching a css selector or throw an error.
  • # (void) csss(selector, min = 0, max = Infinity) Return all elements matching the selector.
  • # (void) bindInputToState(propertyName) Bind a named input to the state property of the same name, e.g.
  • # (void) setClassIf(className, condition, element = @_element)

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(_state, html)

Instance Method Details

# (void) overwrite(target)

Replace an existing DOM node with this component

# (void) appendTo(target)

Insert this component into an DOM node

# (void) setVisible(visible)

# (void) setInnerText(el, text)

Remove an element's existing content and replace it with text @param el a css selector or DOM element

# (void) css(selector)

Return the single element matching a css selector or throw an error. If selector is already an element, return it.

# (void) csss(selector, min = 0, max = Infinity)

Return all elements matching the selector. Optionally, throw an exception of the number of matching elements is not between min and max values

# (void) bindInputToState(propertyName)

Bind a named input to the state property of the same name, e.g. if the input is then changing state.foo will update the inputs and vice versa.

# (void) setClassIf(className, condition, element = @_element)

    Quickly fuzzy find classes, mixins, methods, file:

    • T Open fuzzy finder dialog

    Control the navigation frame:

    • L Toggle list view
    • C Show class list
    • I Show mixin list
    • F Show file list
    • M Show method list
    • E Show extras list

    You can focus and blur the search input:

    • S Focus search input
    • Esc Blur search input
